Cogwheel.NAME: Cogwheel
Cogwheel.FLAVOR: A piece of old machinery, carefully preserved.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 #yArtifact at the start of each combat.

MasterCore.NAME: Master Core
MasterCore.FLAVOR: A core stolen from one of the Guardians. Summons other cores to your aid.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 random #yCores into your draw pile.

ClockworkPhoenix.NAME: Clockwork Phoenix
ClockworkPhoenix.FLAVOR: An artificial being designed to imitate the real thing. Amazingly lifelike.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yupgraded Construct cards can now be #yMega-upgraded outside of combat.

ClawGrip.NAME: Claw Grip
ClawGrip.FLAVOR: An extendable arm used to grab hard-to-reach objects.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of each turn, #yRetain a random card. It costs #b1 less [R] next turn.

FoamFinger.NAME: Foam Finger
FoamFinger.FLAVOR: Always useful when you need a helping hand.

MegaBattery.NAME: Mega Battery
MegaBattery.FLAVOR: Developed by gremlin inventors in an attempt to create a self-aware robot. It did not go well.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, #yMega-upgrade a random Construct card.

RocketBooster.NAME: Rocket Booster
RocketBooster.FLAVOR: It doesn't matter how weak your swing is when you're moving at 200 miles per hour.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you defeat an Elite, #yUpgrade a random card.

PurpleEmber.NAME: Purple Ember
PurpleEmber.FLAVOR: A ghostly, flickering flame. It seems to absorb the power of nearby fires.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you enter a Rest Site, your starting hand next combat is #yMega-upgraded until the end of combat.

WeddingRing.NAME: Wedding Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose 2 cards. Once per turn, after you play one of them, play the other one too.

Photocopier.NAME: Photocopier
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play a non-Rare card each combat, shuffle 2 copies of that card into your draw pile.
